column5: I have 2,  possibly 3 days work in the Newmarket area and room for ONE able bodied person. You'd have to be comfortable with heights to 30' -able to lift 30-40lb. Workboots are a must, as well as warm clothing. The job pays cash on your last day worked this week. $15-20/hr depending on your contribution. I'm driving in from the Pickering area, 401 to 404 North, to Newmarket. Anyone interested, shoot me a PM Thanx, Peter
Ya got anything easier than that?.... Like maybe tasting pies in a nice warm kitchen?
ahahaha....how about a slice of PecanPie...after a bowl of Grits. J/K  Seriously required is a helper for a couple of days and it pays cash.

Thank-you all to those that either, phoned, E-mailed or PM'd me about this work. The positions have all been filled but, I have your contacts handy in case, others or this project is extended beyond what was expected happens. Again, many, many thanks.  Feel free to continue inquiring as we do work every day. Peter
If you pay my travel time ,I'm in!Glad you found help and glad you have work.Take care! Joe
I still want the pie tastin' job!
Glad to hear you got taken care of.  I really thought that I would see a certain someone with a certain hat on after last saturday   Whopper
Just go to the local 7-11 and get you a big old RC cola and a moon pie. That should hold you over till Thanksgivin day and then you will get some pies.  Art
